channel.title: How to make spells not need runes
channel.description:
Hey... I need to know how to make spells so that they don't need runes... On TestScape plz... Cause they need runes and i dont need that
Please reply

item.title: How to make spells not need runes
item.dc:creator: @aliagmed aliagmed
item.description:
@aliagmed wrote:

lol ill check if it helps… I just downloaded testscape and it requires runes automaticaly I don’t like that…
Edit:
Already edited the teleports… Now just the attack spells…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make spells not need runes

item.title: How to make spells not need runes
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Can you show me how to make them require runes

My Phonescape server doesn’t require runes, and I want them to. Sort of opposite questions here. Can you send me a copy of your Ice Barrage code please?

Here’s my barrage, see if this helps:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -93) { if((playerHasItemAmount (560, 4)==false) && (playerHasItemAmount (565, 4)==false) && (playerHasItemAmount (554, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
